title: 3 Bedroom Manufactured Home
posting_body: Just looking for a change of scenery?
Look no further than this 2017 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home!
Offering 1568 square feet of space, a large updated kitchen, a dining room, living room and den, not to mention the laundry room!
This home has so much more to offer then just the space inside!
Its also located in Oakland Glens a professionally maintained manufactured home community located in Novi on the Novi and Walled Lake border.
Reach out today and don't miss your chance to make this your new home!
